message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $18,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significant. Let's meet at $15,000.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $12,000?
